item.title: Diversification
item.description: I hope by the post my audience will see that when the post title is simple a term such as Diversification is that it is because we need a solid understanding of the fundamental terms, concepts and goals before moving on; solid understanding of the fundamentals is half way to mastery after all. In order to demonstrate diversification (what it is NOT) let’s do a casino example (pure gambling in this case).
